QuestData.Title: Whispers from Oronaar
QuestData.Description: Ethereals, the Void, a Dark Naaru... I feel they are all connected.$b$bI explored the ruins below while you and Velen were seeking the Crown. There are survivors, $n.$b$bBroken wander the cluster of buildings to our west- I cannot understand much of what they say but I suspect that their minds are not their own.$b$bIf the Void is to blame, we will need to start our investigation there.$b$bI will conduct my own search in the meantime.
